DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the modification of the dose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

Concepts.definition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Property.preferredDefinition: Modification; the act of making something different.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A Conceptual Domain to capture value meanings specfic to SPOREs not suitable for placement elsewhere.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Changed name to match Context per Hvroje Med.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Divisions to represent changes in a dose delivered to an individual.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.: To join or unite with others so as to increase size, quantity, or scope.
